snippet.title: Save the Teenies Trailer #1
snippet.description:
The Teenies need your help! Can you save them? 
 
Discover exciting and addictive action in this unique puzzle game for Android and iOS!

Download now for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.giantmargarita.teenies

and iOS https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/save-the-teenies/id945578235?ls=1&mt=8

The aim of the game is simple. Help the very round and very cute Teenies get to a portal so they can go home. But the Teenies will need your help to overcome fire, water, electricity and their endearing tendency to roll the wrong way!

Save the Teenies will be released on December 14th, 2014 for Android and iOS.


http://www.SaveTheTeenies.com

Like the Teenies on Facebook 
http://www.facebook.com/SaveTheTeenies
 
Follow the Teenies on Google+
https://plus.google.com/+SavetheteeniesGame

Follow the Teenies on Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/SaveTheTeenies

 
Video by Giant Margarita
Music by JewelBeat
